ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( Accounting_Processed__c = TRUE, $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name <> 'Salesforce Admin', $Profile.Name <> 'Accounting Generalist', OR( RecordTypeId = "0124A000001gz5w", RecordTypeId = "0124w000001Yq3N" ) ), TRUE, FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not an accountant. You can't process this record. Please contact John Placht with any concerns.
